abstract: The U.S. stock market staged its biggest rally since May on Wednesday, driving the Dow Jones industrial average above 10,000, as investors rushed to buy blue-chip shares near their lowest levels this year, and those gains continued into Asian markets Thursday morning.
snippet: The U.S. stock market staged its biggest rally since May on Wednesday, driving the Dow Jones industrial average above 10,000, as investors rushed to buy blue-chip shares near their lowest levels this year, and those gains continued into Asian mark...
lead_paragraph: For a day, at least, Wall Street got its groove back.

headline.main: Markets See Biggest Rally Since May
